code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL="http://localhost:5001/api";export const getAlbums=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/albums"));return response.data;};export const getAlbumDetails=async id=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id));return response.data;};export const createAlbum=async albumData=>{const response=await axios.post(API_URL,albumData);return response.data;};export const updateAlbum=async(id,albumData)=>{const response=await axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(id),albumData);return response.data;};export const updateInventory=async(id,inventoryData)=>{const response=await axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/inventory/").concat(id),inventoryData);return response.data;};export const searchAlbums=async query=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/search?q=").concat(query));return response.data;};export const getTopSellingAlbums=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/ensembles/top-selling"));return response.data;};
